definition: to blend into one another/to blend together well
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
to be totally oblivious (to sth)/to have no idea about sth

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火车正朝他们驶过来，两个小男孩却浑然不知。

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.
sentences.chinese: 印章构型稳固，古朴敦厚，大气浑然，至尊无上。

sentences.english: In the most lofty devotion we become unconscious of self.
sentences.chinese: 在最崇高的灵修中，我们变得浑然不觉自我。

sentences.english: The whole five major parts are unified one entity.
sentences.chinese: 全篇五大部分浑然一体，首尾相应。

sentences.english: Cheng Hao' ideal realm embodied the spirit of the philosophy of Cheng Hao.
sentences.chinese: “浑然与物同体”的境界充分彰显了程颢哲学的精神。

sentences.english: We should have known that we are living in the subtle happiness surroundings every day.
sentences.chinese: 其实，我们每天生活在小幸福之中，只是浑然不觉。

sentences.english: That young girl Hun however don't feel, waving hand of a strength son.
sentences.chinese: 那少女浑然未觉，一个劲儿的挥手。

sentences.english: The houses seem to blend into the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 这些屋子与乡村景色浑然一体。

sentences.english: The sorrow of all sorrows is the ignorance of one's ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 人世间最大的悲哀，莫过于对自身的无知浑然不知。

sentences.english: Confucius, where the two are seamless.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子那里，两者是浑然一体的。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, YangManLi also hinted hao's mother, jing jing ni hao was unaware.
sentences.chinese: 其间，杨曼莉还暗示郝京妮的母亲，郝京妮浑然不知。

sentences.english: Different meeting, he has already got into Hun whatsoever forgets my state.
sentences.chinese: 不一会，他已进入了浑然忘我的境界。

sentences.english: The uptown, nestling under the mountain and beside the sea is set in the natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 一个个依山傍海的住宅小区与自然环境浑然天成。

sentences.english: The basis of spycraft is breaking the rules without being noticed.
sentences.chinese: 间谍活动的基要就是在对方浑然不觉时打破规则。

sentences.english: His innate artistic sense can be seen in each piece of work.
sentences.chinese: 在他每一件作品中，都可以看到他浑然天成的艺术感。

sentences.english: Bibo stone bridge and a clean seamless, Waterscape King Bridge, complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 石桥与碧波清流浑然一体，水景桥景，相得益彰。

definition: to be as if.../to be rather like...
to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
to be totally oblivious (to sth)/to have no idea about sth
to play the market/to speculate (on financial markets)/to profiteer
